info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 5:07PM EDT until July 24 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Campbell County in northern Kentucky... Southeastern Hamilton County in southwestern Ohio... Northern Clermont County in southwestern Ohio... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 507 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Salem Heights, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Cincinnati, Fort Thomas, Newport, Loveland, Madeira, Alexandria, Highland Heights, Milford, Bellevue, Dayton, Southgate, Claryville, Forestville, Amelia, Mariemont, Wilder, New Richmond, Terrace Park, Batavia and Silver Grove. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 1 and 2. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
